DESCRIPTION: Allows you to add money to a user.
IS_NAN: Please check the quantity specified. Note that it cannot be negative and must not exceed 10,000.
IS_BOT: Cannot add money to a bot.
TITLE: Addition of change in the wallet of {{username}}.
RESULT: This user had {{startBalance}}€, you just added {{toAdd}}€ to him, he now has {{newBalance}}€ in his wallet.
